label: diag03_001
prompt: Did you see the game yesterday?  Our running back was really good!

children.label: diag03_002
children.prompt: No, I didn't see it.  What did he do that was so good?

children.label: diag03_004
children.prompt: He ran for over 150 yards and scored two touchdowns!

children.label: diag03_005
children.prompt: I'm curious, was everyone on the team good?

children.label: diag03_006
children.prompt: No, the kicker was terrible.  He missed an extra point and a field goal.

children.label: diag03_007
children.prompt: Yeah that's not good, especially since that is his main job.  What is considered good in your line of work?

children.label: diag03_010
children.prompt: I work at a restaurant, so basically good is when the customers are happy.

children.label: diag03_012
children.prompt: Have so ever thought of what makes a person good, regardless of what they do for work?

children.label: diag03_011
children.prompt: I'm an accountant, so basically good is when everything adds up correctly

children.label: diag03_013
children.prompt: Have so ever thought of what makes a person good, regardless of what they do for work?

children.label: diag03_003
children.prompt: Yes, I saw it and it was great.  I'm curious, do you think everyone on the team was good?

children.label: diag03_008
children.prompt: No, the kicker was terrible.  He missed an extra point and a field goal.
